alert.note: Alert for Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 14 at 8:18PM AKST until February 15 at 3:00PM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...NEXT WEATHER FRONT WITH SNOW TO IMPACT SOUTHEAST THROUGH WEDNESDAY... .Snow has started to fall across most of the area except Haines and Skagway as of 8 pm this evening. Expect snow to continue to spread over the area and increase in intensity through the night. Favorable locations for the higher snowfall accumulations are over Yakutat and portions of the Icy Strait Corridor to Juneau. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM AKST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 7 inches. * WHERE...Municipality of Skagway and Haines Borough and Klukwan. * WHEN...until 3 PM AKST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Greatest snowfall rates expected after midnight with highest accumulations along the Chilkat Peninsula and near White Pass. Some mixing with rain is possible near sea level Wednesday afternoon. Snow may continue beyond the advisory timeframe for White Pass, but at a reduced rate.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.

area.areaDesc: Haines Borough and Klukwan; Municipality of Skagway
